about: Hello! My name is Ali Hamad, and I am a web developer based in Lebanon. I graduated with a BE degree in Electrical, Electronics and Communication Engineering and have since taken the Complete Web Developer Zero to Mastery course on Udemy.My passion for coding is especially focused on front-end web development, and I have expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also use popular frameworks like ReactJS and NodeJS, and have experience with back-end technologies such as ExpressJS and Postgres.In addition to my technical skills, I am an avid gamer and hiker, always looking for new adventures and challenges. I believe that the best developers are not only skilled in their craft, but also have diverse interests and perspectives.I have experience deploying and managing projects using platforms like Netlify and Heroku, and I am proficient in version control with Github. With my strong technical skills and passion for web development, I am always eager to learn more and take on new challenges.Thank you for visiting my website, and I hope we can work together to create amazing web experiences!
